metrics.name: java.uptime
metrics.description: Application uptime (msec)

metrics.name: java.runtime_name
metrics.description: An internal Java process identifier

metrics.name: java.memory.heap[init]
metrics.description: Initial Java heap memory configuration size

metrics.name: java.memory.heap[used]
metrics.description: Actual amount of memory in use for the Java heap

metrics.name: java.memory.heap[committed]
metrics.description: Virtual memory size

metrics.name: java.memory.heap[max]
metrics.description: Maximum Java heap memory size

metrics.name: java.memory.nonheap[init]
metrics.description: Initial Java memory configuration size excluding heap space

metrics.name: java.memory.nonheap[used]
metrics.description: Actual memory in use by Java excluding heap space

metrics.name: java.memory.nonheap[committed]
metrics.description: Virtual memory size

metrics.name: java.memory.nonheap[max]
metrics.description: Maximum Java memory size excluding heap space

metrics.name: java.memorypool.metaspace[init]
metrics.description: Initial metaspace memory configuration size

metrics.name: java.memorypool.metaspace[used]
metrics.description: Actual memory in use in metaspace

metrics.name: java.memorypool.metaspace[committed]
metrics.description: Virtual memory size for metaspace pool

metrics.name: java.memorypool.metaspace[max]
metrics.description: Maximum metaspace pool memory size

metrics.name: java.memorypool.peak.metaspace[init]
metrics.description: Initial metaspace memory configuration size

metrics.name: java.memorypool.peak.metaspace[used]
metrics.description: Actual memory in use in metaspace

metrics.name: java.memorypool.peak.metaspace[committed]
metrics.description: Virtual memory size for metaspace pool

metrics.name: java.memorypool.peak.metaspace[max]
metrics.description: Maximum metaspace pool memory size

metrics.name: java.memorypool.permgen[init]
metrics.description: Initial permgen memory configuration size
metrics.mBeanName: java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Perm Gen|Perm Gen|CMS Perm Gen

metrics.name: java.memorypool.permgen[used]
metrics.description: Actual memory in use in permgen space

metrics.name: java.memorypool.permgen[max]
metrics.description: Maximum permgen memory size
metrics.mBeanName: java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Perm Gen|Perm Gen|CMS Perm Gen

metrics.name: java.memory.gc.full.count
metrics.description: Count of JVM full garbage collections

metrics.name: java.memory.gc.full.time
metrics.description: Time spent performing full garbage collections

metrics.name: java.memory.gc.minor.count
metrics.description: Count of JVM minor garbage collections

metrics.name: java.memory.gc.minor.time
metrics.description: Time spent performing minor garbage collections

metrics.name: java.jvm.compilation
metrics.description: Time spent in the JVM doing Java bytecode compilation

metrics.name: java.jvm.classloader.loaded.current
metrics.description: Number of classes currently loaded in memory by the classloader

metrics.name: java.jvm.classloader.unloaded.total
metrics.description: Number of classes unloaded from memory by the classloader

metrics.name: java.jvm.classloader.loaded.total
metrics.description: Total number of classes loaded by the classloader
